column2: I was there for dinner and so I tried the Pan Seared Chicken Breast with Parmesan Fries on the side. I really thought it was just any other overpriced restaurant because the dishes seemed simple
column3: but I was ASTOUNDED. Every part of the dish was amazing
column4: from the tiniest components of carrots and potatoes to the chicken. The chicken was tender and juicy
column6: and the carrots seasoned so well even though they weren't the star. Everything was harmonious and I fell in love.
